Text:
Hi, can you take requests? ;-)
Do you, by any chance, have the film "Birth" in Blu Ray? Could you rip it in 1080p, please? This film has got beautiful cinematography.
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0337876/

This Three Colors triology is a masterpiece by one of my favorite filmmakers. I recommend also my favorite "The Double Life of Veronique", also..."Dekalog", "A Short Film About Love", "A Short Film About Killing" and all the others! ;-)

And thank you for all you great choice of rips/cinema.
